phrases: Would you go with him,
and see what is happening in the conductor's compartment for me?
This is bad!
This is bad!
Barnes was apparently successful in getting two bottles
of the finished product out from the site of the fire.
Where is your daughter?
She is been taken away,
by those men in the white suits.
You were threatened, and could not help it?
Yes, sir.
Gustavo Baggetta's monstrous strength is most extraordinary,
and thinking that I was about to be killed, it just happened.
I told you, do not say anything that will put Eve- chan in danger!
Yeah, sorry about that.
I have taken all measures.
Even if you were in fear for your life,
as with Elean- kun, I do not think much of you using
that sweet girl as an excuse.
Nicholas- kun, you ultimately bear personal responsibility for this incident.
See to it that you are more careful.
Understand?
Very well.
Any word?
None.
They do not appear to have moved yet.
Let me know if there is even the slightest action.
If Gustavo and the Gandors get into an argument over Dallas,
a piece or two of detailed information should turn up.
Tell me what it is, and do not leak anything.
Understood.
H-Help me!
This is the freight hold!
This is the freight hold!
This is Spike.
What is going on?
They are gone!
They have both disappeared!
Send backup!
Send backup immediately!
Calm down!
What happened?
What happened?!
Stop!
Stay back!
Stop! Stop!
Stop!!
I must refuse.
What obligation do you think we are under,
that we must assist you in carrying out your retaliation?
Well...
That outsider, that guy named Firo, is having his run of the place-
You, who are not even members of the family,
do not need to worry about our business affairs.
Then, how about this, Luck- san?
If you would be willing to help us out, we will join your organization.
That is not a bad offer, right?
Listen, Dallas- san, tell me the truth,
have you ever wondered why we have not ever reached out to you before?
You do not think that we have turned a blind eye
to your impudent conduct because we were afraid of you, do you?
I am going to say this clearly for you.
The reason we have not invited you into our organization
is because we have not seen an ounce of worth in it for us.
Because of all of the muggings that you have been perpetrating,
the attention of the police has been drawn toward your direction.
That is why we have not gotten involved.
That is all that people like you are good for, at best.
What do you know about us?
I know that you got the snot beaten out of you
by a young man who clearly looked younger than all of you.
Why, you-
Ber-
Luck, who are these ill-mannered runts?
No one I know.
Huh?
Liquor?
Beats me.
Okay, Mary, you get in here.
You will be able to hide in here by yourself.
But Czes- kun, what about you?
I am going to go on ahead and check things out.
Mary, you stay hidden in here.
Be absolutely sure not to move.
It is okay.
I will be right back, okay?
That takes care of the kid being underfoot.
Now I just have to find the immortals.
Jacuzzi?!
Nick!
You are all right!
Yeah, I got all muddled up.
Where did the lookouts go?
Uh, I am not even sure about that.
Thank you, fuck you, the villain arrives!
Huh?
There are not any lookouts, are there?
That is no fun.
Be that as it may, though, thank goodness you are safe, Lua!
She made it, Ladd.
H-Hey!
Untie my ropes, too!
Huh?
Why?
Something in it for me?
If you were a woman, I would expect a kiss or something,
but you are a man!
Or instead, what if you were to die like this?
In fact, die.
Your fate is to die!
Who was that guy?
Search me.
J-Jacuzzi...
I found you!
No screaming allowed.
I hate to do this to you, Ladd,
but it would be okay if I got this little girl, right?
Unlike Ladd, I only like to torture weak people to death-
There they are!
Those are the guys!
Yo!
Those guys are here with you, are they?
Jacuzzi- kun?
How do you know my name?
Whoops...
Did I neglect to introduce myself?
I am Ladd Russo.
Now you understand how I know who you are, right?
Russo...
You are a member of the Russo Family?
What do you all think you are doing, being aboard this train?
Or rather, who do you think you are?
We are going to be taking complete control of this train,
or kill off half of the passengers,
or, depending on the circumstances, kill off all of them.
If you are not planning on being killed by us,
then hop off and die, right now!
Are you the ones that killed the conductor?
The conductor... has been killed?
Let us go, to the conductor's compartment.
You are lucky.
At the moment, we do not have time to deal with you.
And this is no time for us to be dealing with you, either.
But later, we are going to make sure you pay.
Oh, you are pretty tough, are not you, crybaby?
Let me just tell you,
we are not the ones who got to the conductor, or that room.
Are you just letting them go, Jacuzzi?
For now.
There is someone else we have to take care of first.
That hit-and-run bastard!
Next time we meet, it is going to be brutal!
Brutal!
I will hit it!
You will break your hand!
Then, I will hit the one driving it!
How are you going to pull him out of there?
Then, I will spit on the car!
That is perfect!
What are we going to do, Dallas?
We cannot take on the Gandors.
Shut up!
Damn that miserable punk Firo!
Just you watch.
Someday, we are going to kill him and the Gandors!
Still, your family is loaded, right?
Cannot you come up with some idle money?
They said it all went to a burglar, last month.
That is cold.
Even so, you have at least got something to eat, right?
There is that cute sister of yours.
-You stay away from Eve. -H-Hey...
You do anything to her, and I will make you pay.
A-All right!
Now then, our journey is just about at its end.
It is been a long one, huh?
Yeah.
At the beginning, we were time thieves.
When we stole those watches, right?
There was that time when we tried to steal that whole museum, too!
That was impossible, huh?
Yeah.
So, to at least keep anyone else from going in,
we stole the entrance!
That was heavy, huh?
What made us reconsider our ways, and decide to do good from then on,
was when we stole the inheritance of that rich man.
Now there will not be a fight over the inheritance, huh?
I am sure they are thanking us right about now.
And so...
since it feels so good to do good things,
let us do something good for our last job!
Like what?
We are going to steal the mafia's black money!
Yay!
Isaac, you are so cool!
Hey, now, watch out!
Watch out!
What did you say?!
That is Eve Genoard, right?
So it seems.
Call her down.
How do I do that?
It is your job to figure that out, is not it?
Want some?
No!
All right.
Yes, Genoard residence.
From the newspaper?
Yeah.
They says they got something to say to you, Miss,'bout Master Dallas.
About Big Brother?
Something'bout having new information, or such.
Thing is, it cannot be over the phone.
They says it got to be in person, or they cannot tell you.
Then let us go over to the newspaper.
Jacuzzi...
How did that much blood get up there?
Hey, guys.
There is something up on the forward coupling.
Guys, let us all take a look on go.
Ready, set...
Is that... the Rail Tracer?
What is with you, girlie?
You are dressed funny-
A-All right!
I will let them go!
So lay off of me!
You are the one I have business with.
Amazing!
You got them, all by yourself!
Incredible!
-Thank you!
-Thank you!
Imagine, you helping us, total strangers!
We owe you our lives, missy!
Be careful.
Why did you hit them?
I am terribly sorry.
They suddenly ran out into the street.
Ask us for anything!
We will do anything for you!
Well...
could you help me carry these four back to my car?
Kindapped?
Miss Eve?
Yes, sir.
We just received word.
I told you so!
What do you plan to do about it?!
Huh?
Now, Gustavo probably is not thinking of doing anything to Miss Eve right away.
Elean- kun, calm down.
But sir!
What concerns me is the company's responsibility
in fanning the conflict between the Gandors and the Runoratas.
Nicholas- kun, you have considered that, have not you?
Yes.
I am taking every precaution to see that it does not happen.
See that you do.
Now, go on.
Mr. President, I am sure from his face that he is plotting something!
I know.
Nicholas- kun is probably...
and hoping to uncover some dirt.
He probably wants to find out some top-secret facts, in his own way.
Mr. President, are you saying I should leave it alone?
Top-secret facts notwithstanding,
there is a lot about Dallas Genoard that is unclear.
Has he really become immortal, or has not he?
If something is cleared up because of this, it is just what we want.
Besides, there is the threat of conflict between the Gandors
and the Runoratas without us doing anything at all.
How do you mean?
The legendary assassin, Vino, a.k.a. Claire Stanfield,
is headed toward New York.
Word is, at the behest of Luck Gandor.
Vino...
Aboard the transcontinental express out of Chicago,
the Flying Pussyfoot.
Does not look like I would get much knowledge out of him
if I did devour him,
but I have brought it on myself.
Ennis...
Yes, sir.
Looking up at the starry sky that goes on forever, we sing
a melody of a dream we have of our limited eternity
The water of adoration, overflowing in our hearts
will reach someone in the distant future
I believe so
Running through time prolonged,
our voices calling out will someday become a great song
We can go on spinning our love
though it may still be such a tiny light now
Miria, everything is going to start!
The beginning, huh?
Uh, Ad-wee-na...
It is Ad-weh-na.
Oh, right.
Ad-wee-na... A-wehss
You have reversed it, Isaac.
A-weh-nass... Ad-na...
